parameters.name: AllViews
parameters.description: True to get all of the dependent views in this view, false to get only the SpecificViewType views in this view

parameters.name: SpecificViewType
parameters.description: Type of dependent view as defined in swDrawingViewTypes_e

title: IView.IGetDependentViews
description: Gets either all, or only the specified, dependent views in this view.
signature:
View IGetDependentViews( 
   System.Boolean
AllViews
,
   System.Int32
SpecificViewType
,
   System.Int32
DependentViewCount
)

parameters.name: AllViews
parameters.description: True to get all of the dependent views in this view, false to get only the SpecificViewType views in this view

parameters.name: SpecificViewType
parameters.description: Type of dependent view as defined in swDrawingViewTypes_e

remarks:
Call
IView::GetDependentViewCount
before calling this method to get the value of DependentViewCount.
